text: Ability to put and manage watermark on PDF.
Calls improvements: new joining process, updated user interface and user experience
Emails for Passkey created and deleted.
Location info field for files and folders added in Chat.
Updated user experience to assign Channel Manager.
Improved user experience of sending invitation.
Updated close icons around the applicaiton.
Improved naming when items names are the same.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements mainly for Calls.
